messages.title: AN IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM THERESA MAY TO YOU
messages.content: Getting on with the job of securing the best possible deal from Brexit is vital. ...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Take back control of our borders, laws, and our money, sign new trade deals, ensure Brexit works for you and the whole of the United Kingdom, provide as much clarity as possible, maintaining a strong negotiating hand.

With a good deal from Brexit we can keep our growing economy and all the public services we rely on: well-paid jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.
Strong and stable leadership to ensure the best possible deal from Brexit is secured.

mentions.tacticalSituation: DON'T RISK A COALITION OF CHAOS – VOTE THERESA MAY on 8th June

issues.brexitEurope: The only way you can ensure we have the strong and stable leadership to get this right is by backing me, and voting for my Conservative candidate in your local area.

housing.content: With a good deal from Brexit we can keep our growing economy and all the public services we rely on: well-paid jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: The only way you can ensure we have the strong and stable leadership to get this right is by backing me, and voting for my Conservative candidate in your local area.

quotes.text: Your vote counts. It will count to strengthen Theresa May’s hand in the UK’s negotiating position on Brexit.

images.caption: Comparative risks highlighting Theresa May vs Jeremy Corbyn
Past shock election outcomes related to Trump, Brexit vote

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the risks of not voting for Theresa May and the Conservative Party, using the potential of Jeremy Corbyn becoming Prime Minister as a warning. No detailed constituency-specific information or direct contact information for the candidate is provided on the leaflet.
